prompt:
The police raided the chop shop at dawn, uncovering dozens of stolen luxury cars being stripped for parts.
He made a fortune running a chop shop in the industrial district, turning hot rods into untraceable components overnight.
In the heart of the city, the chop shop buzzed with the sound of saws dismantling vehicles from the latest heist.
Authorities busted the notorious chop shop, arresting the crew who had fenced thousands in auto parts.
The chop shop owner evaded capture for years by relocating operations to abandoned warehouses on the outskirts.
Stolen sedans lined the backlot of the chop shop, waiting to be gutted and sold on the black market.
Undercover agents infiltrated the chop shop, witnessing the brutal efficiency of thieves carving up high-end SUVs.
The chop shop's greasy floors were littered with fenders and engines from cars jacked in broad daylight.
Rival gangs clashed over territory near the chop shop, fighting for control of the lucrative stolen parts trade.
Mechanics at the chop shop worked around the clock, swapping VIN numbers on frames from across the state.
